structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXVII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY OLYMPIC EXPLORATORY COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-2077. Duties and responsibilities.
The Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee shall:
Seek input and support from the public and private sectors during the evaluation of the feasibility of submitting a bid for and potentially hosting the Olympic Games or the Pan American Games or any other comparable international athletic events; and
Submit an annual report to the Board of County Commissioners as to its findings.
